publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7666 Hugh Henry: Gerry Rafferty—That the Parliament is saddened by the death of the Paisley-born musician, Gerry Rafferty; offers condolences to his family and friends; considers that his Paisley roots had a huge influence on his artistic development; recognises his contribution to music in Scotland; further recognises his influence on musicians and music fans throughout the world, and believes that he has left a musical legacy that will continue to be enjoyed for generations to come.

S3M-7666 Gerry Rafferty (lodged on 6 January 2011) Helen Eadie*, Brian Adam*, Pauline McNeill*, Jim Tolson*, Jack McConnell*, John Wilson*, Kenneth Gibson*, David McLetchie*, Elaine Smith*, Claire Baker*, Nanette Milne*, Bob Doris*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Cathy Peattie*, Tricia Marwick*, Jackie Baillie*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Butler*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Ross Finnie*, Johann Lamont*, James Kelly*, Jamie McGrigor*, Patricia Ferguson*, David Whitton*, Des McNulty*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Trish Godman*, Murdo Fraser*, Elaine Murray*, Robin Harper*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-7666 Gerry Rafferty (lodged on 6 January 2011) Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Stewart Stevenson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-7666 Gerry Rafferty (lodged on 6 January 2011) Jim Hume*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-7666 Gerry Rafferty (lodged on 6 January 2011) Tom McCabe*, John Scott*, Sarah Boyack*
S3M-7666 Gerry Rafferty (lodged on 6 January 2011) Maureen Watt*, Linda Fabiani*
S3M-7666 Gerry Rafferty (lodged on 6 January 2011) Irene Oldfather*
S3M-7666 Gerry Rafferty (lodged on 6 January 2011) Stewart Maxwell*
